705469f-a.title: Brooklyn: Linden Street - Bushwick Avenue
705469f-a.text:
44 Linden Street, at the S.W. corner of Boshwick Ave.,showing the
Samuel Meeker residence built by him in 1852. He was also responsible for
the laying out of the street from Broadway to Evergreen Ave. (Dr. Lewis
E. Meeker lived here in 1911. The house is not on the 1929 maps).
March 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
